bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Electric Penetration Assemblies in Containment Structures for Nuclear Power Generating Stations
IEEE Standard for Electric Penetration Assemblies in Containment Structures for Nuclear Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard prescribes the requirements for the design, construction, test, and installation of electric penetration assemblies in nuclear containment structures for stationary nuclear power generating stations. The requirements for external circuits which connect to penetration assemblies are beyond the scope of this standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
